definitions.definition: A brag ; ostentatious positive appraisal of oneself.

examples: It was his regular boast that he could eat two full English breakfasts in one sitting.

definitions.definition: A shot where the ball is driven off a side wall and then strikes the front wall .

main_definition: A brag ; ostentatious positive appraisal of oneself.
secondary_definitions: ( squash ) A shot where the ball is driven off a side wall and then strikes the front wall .
